Name: De Ruimte
Review Text: In the middle of nowhere stands De Ruimte, a cozy building with a quirky look in and outside. The menu seems to change everyday, we got a selection of delicious currys, everything was really tasty and paired well with some nice local beers. The atmosphere was super relaxed, we will definitely come back for one of their musical events.

Name: De Ruimte
Review Text: When it is warm outside, you can eat and drink outside where you can see artists at work. They have a nice selection of beers and a few dishes of food to choose from.

Name: De Ruimte
Review Text: Love this place. Totally off the beaten track. Great beer selection, good food, awesome building and plenty of quirky events.

Name: De Ruimte
Review Text: Lovely new terrace with easy but good food and a big selection of nice drinks. Relaxed place.

Name: De Ruimte
Review Text: Really enjoyed the food & drinks.

Name: De Ruimte
Review Text: Great view and extremely friendly staff. Food tasty and good drinks!
